title: A Summons to Perdition
description: When JD Welch receives a call from a former associate before his retirement, he is puzzled and not a little uneasy. He is shocked when he is asked to investigate the disappearance of Mike Wolseki's grand-daughter some five days previously. He agrees to take the job on condition that his former cop partner, Joe Bryerson, comes in on the deal. What they uncover is a horrifying conspiracy.
author: John L. Work
